hexes.description: Northern Deep ‚Äî open ocean north of the island.
Sunken Town & Underwater Depot ‚Äî submerged ruins visible through clear water.
NW Shallows ‚Äî coral reefs and shallow waters.
Northern coastal settlement. A small port at the island's northern tip.
NE Shallows ‚Äî rocky coastline with tide pools.
NW coast ‚Äî Coastal Divers' Lodge North, Water Clock, and Pixie Boat anchorage.
Sweeping valley with enormous kites riding thermal winds.
Upper slopes of Mount Arbora. Jumaga's Roost and the Ledge of Offering.
Chisuay's Teahouse ‚Äî elegant teahouse run by a dashing oni sorcerer.
NE coast ‚Äî rocky cliffs above churning waters.
NW coast ‚Äî Island of Hmug visible offshore.
Kuroki Village ‚Äî forest settlement near the mountain.
Lom & Salt's College of Arms ‚Äî training grounds on the hillside.
Hogstone Hot Springs ‚Äî healing hamlet around natural hot springs.
Toggle ‚Äî smithing hamlet on Mount Arbora's eastern slope. Opu Opu Spring nearby.
Toraf & Boulder's School of Guts & Grit ‚Äî martial training academy.
Coastal Divers' Lodge East ‚Äî NE coast outpost of the Mariners' Guild.
Western coast ‚Äî forested cliffs above the ocean.
Uluwa / Ferry Crossing ‚Äî the Spirit Market, a twilight bazaar.
Matango Village ‚Äî mushroom-obsessed village. Five fungal factions.
Dense forest wilderness between Matango and the Graysteps.
The Graysteps ‚Äî grey stone village on Mount Arbora's western slope.
Forested foothills ‚Äî transition zone between mountains and wetlands.
Goodie Mart ‚Äî provisions outpost at the edge of Brackwater Wetlands.
Gobo Village ‚Äî settlement in the eastern forests.
Eastern coast ‚Äî mangrove-lined shore.
Western deep ‚Äî Island of Hmug and open ocean.
Sheep Dragon Grazing Grounds ‚Äî pastoral meadows in the western forest.
Wooded hills ‚Äî wilderness between western settlements.
The Way Gate & Amak Shurak ‚Äî ancient waypoint at the island's crossroads.
Rolling foothills ‚Äî wilderness between mountains and wetlands.
Roa Kala ‚Äî sacred grove of the Kohdoi dara.
Hakumon's Ramen Shop ‚Äî legendary ramen in the wetlands.
Ten Wheels Grove ‚Äî ancient grove in Brackwater Wetlands.
Polewater Village & The Sally Sue ‚Äî stilts village, closest to Corruption.
The Coral Castle ‚Äî Lionfish King's underwater fortress.
Coastal Divers' Lodge West ‚Äî western coast outpost.
Okiri Village ‚Äî quiet farming hamlet with shepherds and slingers.
Fort Harglo ‚Äî Courier Brigade fortress at the crossroads.
Witching Tower ‚Äî Fish Head Coven compound with four Gatehouses.
North & East Gatehouse area ‚Äî Witching Tower outer defenses.
River Master's Tower ‚Äî overlooks the eastern rivers.
Shade Wood & Whispering Forest ‚Äî dense, eerie woodland.
Ekmu Village ‚Äî settlement at the edge of the eastern forest.
Eastern coast ‚Äî New Moon Lagoon and coastal waters.
SW coast ‚Äî rocky waters and fishing grounds.
Crak Caves ‚Äî cave system in the western hills.
SW interior wilderness ‚Äî scrubby hills and goat paths.
South Gatehouse & West Gatehouse area ‚Äî southern Witching Tower defenses.
Opal Falls ‚Äî cascading waterfalls from the highland plateau.
Broken Bird Airfield ‚Äî First Age airfield ruins.
Crumbled Hut ‚Äî mysterious ruins in the Coastal Highlands.
SE forest wilderness ‚Äî dense canopy and hidden trails.
SE coast ‚Äî highland cliffs above the ocean.
SW coast ‚Äî open waters south of Tidewater.
Tidewater ‚Äî sandy coastal village. Tower of Glass holds the Pearl of Rongol.
Lake Ellior area ‚Äî forested lowlands around a shimmering lake.
Temple of Shoom ‚Äî ancient nakudama ziggurat rising from coastal waters.
Southern fields ‚Äî open grassland approaching the coast.
AHA Headquarters ‚Äî observatory and research campus.
SE waters ‚Äî Cloud Depot visible on the horizon.
SW coast ‚Äî fishing waters south of Tidewater.
Yatamon ‚Äî largest city on Obojima. Spirit trolleys, undercity below.
Coastal Divers' Lodge South ‚Äî southern coast outpost.
Southern coast ‚Äî surf breaks against dark volcanic rock.
Southern Shallows ‚Äî Lionfish King patrols these waters.
Southern Deep ‚Äî the Venomous Rex's corrupted forces.
Far northern ocean ‚Äî deep blue waters beyond sight of land.
Far northern ocean ‚Äî wind-swept open sea.
Far NE ocean ‚Äî distant horizon and circling seabirds.
NW ocean ‚Äî whitecaps rolling toward the island.
NE ocean ‚Äî rocky shoals and strong currents.
NW ocean ‚Äî kelp forests visible beneath the surface.
NE coastal waters ‚Äî waves crash against volcanic rock.
Far NE ocean ‚Äî deep currents from the open sea.
NW coastal waters ‚Äî sheltered cove with driftwood.
NE coastal waters ‚Äî riptides along the cliffs.
Far NE ocean ‚Äî nothing but open water to the east.
NW coastal waters ‚Äî Island of Hmug looms nearby.
Western ocean ‚Äî swells rolling in from the deep.
Eastern ocean ‚Äî warm currents from the tropics.
Western deep ‚Äî dark waters and occasional whale spouts.
Eastern ocean ‚Äî mangrove debris floating on the tide.
Western ocean ‚Äî Hmug's shadow visible on clear days.
Eastern ocean ‚Äî the Corruption's haze darkens the horizon.
Far western ocean ‚Äî deep waters beyond the Coral Castle.
Far eastern ocean ‚Äî murky waters touched by Corruption.
SW ocean ‚Äî fishing boats from Tidewater range here.
SE coastal waters ‚Äî strong undertow near the cliffs.
SW ocean ‚Äî deep blue waters south of Crak Caves.
SE coastal waters ‚Äî coral formations below the surface.
SE ocean ‚Äî the Cloud Depot's silhouette on the horizon.
Far SW ocean ‚Äî deep ocean beyond Tidewater.
SW coastal waters ‚Äî sandy shallows near Tidewater.
Southern coastal waters ‚Äî volcanic reefs below.
SE ocean ‚Äî warm shallow waters over sand.
Far SW ocean ‚Äî open sea stretching to the horizon.
Southern ocean ‚Äî Lionfish King's patrol boundary.
Southern ocean ‚Äî dark volcanic rock beneath the waves.
Far southern ocean ‚Äî empty waters and distant storms.
Far southern ocean ‚Äî the Venomous Rex's domain deepens.
Far southern deep ‚Äî corrupted waters at the map's edge.

locations.name: Durrin
locations.description: Northern coastal settlement at the island's tip.

locations.name: Coastal Divers' Lodge (North)
locations.description: NW coast outpost. Water Clock and Pixie Boat nearby.

locations.name: Sky Kite Valley
locations.description: Second largest settlement. Enormous kites, barges, aeronauts.

locations.name: Jumaga's Roost
locations.description: Climbing settlement near the elder sky salamander's lair.

locations.name: Chisuay's Teahouse
locations.description: Elegant teahouse run by an oni sorcerer. Awakened fossa staff.

locations.name: Kuroki Village
locations.description: Forest village near the mountain.

locations.name: Hogstone Hot Springs
locations.description: Healing hamlet around natural hot springs.

locations.name: Toraf & Boulder's School of Guts & Grit
locations.description: Martial training academy in the hills.

locations.name: Coastal Divers' Lodge (East)
locations.description: NE coast outpost of the Mariners' Guild.

locations.name: Uluwa (Spirit Market)
locations.description: Twilight bazaar where spirits and mortals trade. Ferry Crossing.

locations.name: Matango Village
locations.description: Mushroom village. Five fungal factions compete for Truffle Prince.

locations.name: The Graysteps
locations.description: Grey stone village on Mount Arbora's western slope.

locations.name: Goodie Mart
locations.description: Provisions outpost at the Brackwater edge. Subway station.

locations.name: Gobo Village
locations.description: Eastern forest settlement.

locations.name: Roa Kala
locations.description: Sacred grove of the Kohdoi dara.

locations.name: Hakumon's Ramen Shop
locations.description: Legendary ramen in the wetlands. Oni chef.

locations.name: Polewater Village
locations.description: Stilts village in Brackwater. Closest to the Corruption. Sally Sue nearby.

locations.name: Coastal Divers' Lodge (West)
locations.description: Western coast outpost of the Mariners' Guild.

locations.name: Okiri Village
locations.description: Quiet farming hamlet. Shepherds, slingers, Miss Lindley fixes anything.

locations.name: Fort Harglo
locations.description: Courier Brigade fortress at the crossroads.

locations.name: Witching Tower (Fish Head Coven)
locations.description: Fish Head Coven compound. Council of Three and Thirty. Four Gatehouses.

locations.name: Ekmu Village
locations.description: Settlement at the eastern forest edge.

locations.name: Opal Falls
locations.description: Cascading waterfalls from the highland plateau.

locations.name: Broken Bird Airfield
locations.description: First Age airfield ruins. Spirit Plitsu guards.

locations.name: Tidewater
locations.description: Sandy coastal village. Tower of Glass holds the Pearl of Rongol.

locations.name: AHA Headquarters
locations.description: Observatory and research campus. The Asloh triumvirate.

locations.name: Yatamon
locations.description: Largest city on Obojima. Spirit trolleys, detective agencies, undercity.

locations.name: Coastal Divers' Lodge (South)
locations.description: Southern coast outpost.

locations.name: Sunken Town & Underwater Depot
locations.description: Submerged ruins north of the island.

locations.name: The Coral Castle
locations.description: Lionfish King's underwater fortress.

locations.name: Crak Caves
locations.description: Cave system in the western hills.

locations.name: Temple of Shoom
locations.description: Ancient nakudama ziggurat. Midwives above, Voraro feeds below.

locations.name: Toggle
locations.description: A human mining town called toggle
locations.trouble: Strange lights are seen in the hills at night
locations.quirk: A strange monument stands in the center of town

sites.name: The Black Crown
sites.description: A rustic lodge with a roaring fireplace
sites.secret: A ghost haunts the upper floors

sites.name: The Broken Orc
sites.description: A smoky drinking hall filled with locals
sites.quirk: Locals avoid this place for unknown reasons

sites.name: Old Provisions
sites.description: A dusty emporium selling everything imaginable

rumors.text: Whatever's in Temple of Shoom is waking up. The ground shakes at night now.
A child went missing near The Coral Castle. The search party found only her doll - and strange tracks leading inside.
Aldric Blackwood inherited a map but can't read it. Might be worth something to the right person.
An old map surfaced showing The Coral Castle. The merchant who sold it was found dead the next morning.

notices.title: WARNING
notices.description: WARNING: goblins reported on the the old mill road

notices.title: BOUNTY
notices.description: BOUNTY: a notorious thief - Dead or Alive. 62 gold reward

history.founding: Built by families escaping famine and plague
majorEvents: A famous battle was fought on these grounds

secrets.text: A resident is maintaining a secret correspondence with a rival settlement

sensoryImpressions: A bard's tune drifts from the tavern

npcs.name: Gareth Brightwater
npcs.flavorWant: Escort for a secret meeting with a rival

npcs.name: Brynn Blackwood
npcs.flavorWant: Someone to deliver medicine to family in another village
npcs.secret: Is dying of a mysterious illness

npcs.name: Cedric Brightwater
npcs.flavorWant: Help driving off wolves threatening the farm
npcs.secret: Is planning to betray their allies

npcs.name: Elric Stoneheart
npcs.description: A shrewd trader with a ready smile
npcs.flavorWant: Guards for a valuable cargo shipment

npcs.name: Gareth Stoneheart
npcs.description: A vigilant watchman in worn armor
npcs.flavorWant: Evidence to catch a corrupt official

npcs.description: A tired laborer with a kind smile
npcs.flavorWant: Help driving off wolves threatening the farm
npcs.secret: Is not who they claim to be

npcs.description: A shrewd trader with a ready smile

npcs.name: Brynn Blackwood
npcs.description: A weathered farmer with calloused hands
npcs.flavorWant: Escort for their child traveling to apprenticeship
